name: Rum Bullions Island Bar
description: Rum Bullions Island Bar sits beneath Silver Legacy's iconic dome, offering tropical-inspired cocktails in a unique island setting right on the casino floor. The bar is known for its frozen drinks, rum specialties, and festive atmosphere. It's a lively stop that brings a taste of the tropics to the High Sierra.
shortDescription: Tropical island bar beneath Silver Legacy's iconic dome with frozen rum cocktails.

faqs.question: Where is Rum Bullions?
faqs.answer: Beneath Silver Legacy's signature dome on the main casino floor.

faqs.question: What are the drink specialties?
faqs.answer: Tropical frozen drinks, rum cocktails, and island-inspired beverages.

faqs.question: Is it a full bar?
faqs.answer: Yes, while rum is the specialty, they serve a full range of cocktails, beer, and wine.

meta.title: Rum Bullions Island Bar – Silver Legacy Dome | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Sip tropical cocktails beneath Silver Legacy's dome at Rum Bullions Island Bar. Frozen drinks and island vibes in downtown Reno.
